name: Frigid Star Fields [RPG] - Beta
description:
✦ Made in 1 week for the Gherwit Totally Cool & Awesome Game Jam!!

Note: The game is unfinished and is more of a demo/beta. But now that I have proved my coolness, I can finally rest :D

✦ How to Play?

- Use [arrows] and [WASD] to move

- [mouse] to aim and [Z] or [click] to use tools/interact

- [0-9] to select an item in your hotbar

- [E] to open full inventory and crafting menu

- [P] to pause (save/load)

✦ About the game

This is a crafting RPG where you can cut down trees, trade/buy items, and plant crops. I really wanted to join the game jam, so I'm just glad I made something.

✦ To-do

Some of the features I plan to add after the jam are:

- Interiors ⛪️

- Better crafting [⚒️]

- Fishing and boats [⛵️] ️

- Bigger maps / advanced mob spawning [⛰️]

✦ Credits:

- @griffpatch for the basic tile RPG code (tutorial)

- Butter Milk on itch.io for art assets (modified by me)

- @Minimalion (alphabetica) for Procedural Generation

- @Mazmythic for TextboxKit (text engine)

- ⭐ Inspired by Animal Crossing New Horizons, Stardew Valley, and Don't Starve

- Lotovik on itch for fonts and UI assets (save/load)

- Uhhh... Myself, @joshpinto6 for everything else!

#RiseOfThePixel
